name: Breadland Stock Exchange
description:
Breadland Stock Exchange is an awesome text-based game where you land up in the world's biggest stock market(?) and go through 12 rounds of trades and finally come out either rich, poor or...

HOW TO PLAY?

TYPE IN POSITIVE NUMBERS TO BUY STOCKS AND NEGATIVE NUMBERS TO SELL STOCK

STOCK PRICES FLUCTUATES EVERY ROUND. SO BEWARE!

SELL YOUR STOCK WHEN IT'S THE RIGHT TIME AND BECOME RICHER!!!
